skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 50% chance of decreasing the target's Turn Meter by 10%. Damage inflicted is proportional to DEF.

skills.desc: Places an [Unkillable] buff and a 25% [Increase ATK] buff on a target ally for 2 turns.
skills.name: Damage Control

skills.desc: Attacks 3 times at random. Each hit has a 30% chance of placing a 100% [Heal Reduction] debuff and a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns. Damage inflicted is proportional to DEF.
skills.name: Life Shackles
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
